name: Job Hunter
description:
How to play:

Use wasd to explore the town while you wait for call backs from the various job applications that you have submitted. Maybe there will be someone waiting to see you !

Use you abilities to outdo the hiring managers so that you can find a secure well paying job

Credits:

Level design, Development: Ashley Proctor

A Special Thanks to these Awesome creators and their Assets that brought my project to life
